Text:
Albert Pinto Ko Gussa Kyon Ata Hai
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080343/

This 1980 film by critically acclaimed Director Saeed Akhtar Mirza, captures the angst of ordinary Mumbai citizens exemplified by a young Christian car mechanic, Albert Pinto (Naseeruddin Shah) who derives vicarious pleasure from his rich clients lifestyle, which brings him in conflict with his family, his father who is mill worker, and joins the strike.

Director: Saeed Akhtar Mirza
Writers: Saeed Akhtar Mirza and Kundan Shah

Cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Shabana Azmi, Smita Patil, Dilip Dhawan, Om Puri, Sulabha Deshpande, Arvind Deshpande.

Hindi / Color / 110 min.
This is a DVDRip.
No subtitles.

Credit to the original uploader.
